hero.title: Cyber-Security & Privacy
hero.description: Cybersecurity and privacy are significant issues that can impact a person's daily life. Lebanese authorities, such as Telecommunications Regulatory Authority, the Internal Security Forces, and the Lebanese General Security address relevant issues and advise citizens to be vigilant in the digital world.

cards.title: Account Protection
cards.content: Protect your online accounts such as social media and email.

cards.title: Device Protection
cards.content: Protect your devices from remote and in-person vulnerabilities.

cards.title: Digital Privacy
cards.content: Maintain your privacy in the digital world

cards.title: Blackmail
cards.content: Protect your online accounts such as social media and email.

cards.title: Cyberattacks
cards.content: Learn about cyberattacks and how to avoid them.

pinkCards.title: Setting up 2-Factor Authentication
pinkCards.content: Keep your account safe with an extra security step.

pinkCards.title: Creating a password
pinkCards.content: Learn how to create a strong, safe password.

pinkCards.title: Phishing
pinkCards.content: A popular type cyberattacks is phishing. Learn how to protect yourself.
